column1: The longer Stephen Miller remains in the White House the more damage he will inflict upon our immigrant and minority communities.   That’s why I’m calling for his firing.   https://t.co/yUscgW5lzu
Happy Holidays! https://t.co/pAEGAoY26E

The only remedy for our president’s grave repeated abuse of power and undermining of our democracy is impeachment. We cannot allow any future president to believe that such behavior is acceptable. History will judge this day.

Betsy DeVos went against the Education Department's ruling and ordered students to pay back their debt after they were defrauded. That’s wrong.   DeVos and the Trump administration need to start putting students before profits.  https://t.co/iMmBlGlU9d

What I hear most often from constituents across #WA08 is “What are you going to do about the cost of our prescription drugs?”  Today I’m so proud to have answered that question by passing #HR3!   https://t.co/RlxcKGcwxi

The Trump administration recently announced massive cuts to #SNAP. Hundreds of thousands of families will be impacted.   Especially with the holidays right around the corner many families will struggle to put food on the table.  https://t.co/w4Dd2k3Oxm
From our family to yours #HappyThanksgiving! https://t.co/RFuE2ejoVb

The Supreme Court will soon decide if the Trump administration has the right to end #DACA. We cannot let that happen. It's time for the Senate to take up the House’s bill to protect DREAMers today.  https://t.co/N7wOng1oXS

Today I'm thinking about the bravery and patriotism of the men and women who have served in our nation's military.   Our veterans have done so much for us and continue to serve our country in so many ways. Thank you to all who have served and happy #VeteransDay.

One year ago today the people of #WA08 put their trust in me and elected me to represent them in Congress.  Since that day a year ago I have done my very best to be a voice for our entire district and I promise to continue to be a voice for every one of you. https://t.co/dR2wtXpKJZ

I’m proud to have the endorsement of @PPact again!   As the only woman doctor in Congress I understand the importance of reproductive health care and will stand up against anti-choice attacks. https://t.co/CksMZY2kUT
I had a great time at the Golden Tennis Shoe Awards yesterday with @MurrayCampaign @PramilaJayapal @SuzanDelBene & women leaders from across Washington state! https://t.co/txWK0s6LD7
L'shanah Tovah! Happy Rosh Hashanah to all those celebrating!

The @NRCC’s behavior is despicable. Seems that nothing's out of bounds. What's next ... going after our children? The depths they’re sinking to shows they’re just desperate to change the subject. Completely unbelievable and disrespectful. https://t.co/bIe7HZQSJG
Climate change is real and it’s happening right now. I’m so proud of the young people (and the older folks supporting them too!) standing up for our world’s future. https://t.co/jrKMRt3ciS
18 years ago our country was changed forever. Today and every day we remember the innocent lives lost and honor the heroic first responders who ran toward danger to help others.

Happy Labor Day! While folks who have today off are enjoying time with friends & family let’s remember that the reason we have holidays weekends safe working conditions and so many other things is the Labor movement. #LaborStrong

We passed #HR8 and #HR1112 in the House to help address the epidemic of gun violence in our communities. It’s time for Mitch McConnell to bring these bills up for a vote in the Senate. #EnoughIsEnough

One of the things I enjoy most about representing the 8th district is that I get the chance to spend time at community events like the Ellensburg Rodeo Parade! The boys and I had so much fun seeing everyone. Such a fun day! https://t.co/LzG2sBnC9i

My heart goes out to all those feeling scared & angry —we all are at times like these. I’m working hard passing legislation and speaking out in Congress and in our community. I’ll continue to do so until we get real gun reform #EnoughIsEnough  https://t.co/sBhp7f0WmC

The 2nd mass shooting in 24 hours. One of my first actions in Congress was to cosponsor & pass HR8 the most sweeping gun reform bill in a decade. It’s waiting—along with many other important bills—on Mitch McConnell’s desk to go to the Senate for a vote. (1/2)

In the greatest country in the world we shouldn’t have to feel afraid to go shopping enjoy a festival send our kids to school attend a concert see a movie or be in our homes. My heart goes out to all those impacted today—& every day—by gun violence https://t.co/y8PE68EZLW

When I ran for Congress I made a pledge to reject corporate PAC money and called for #ReformFirst. In Congress I was proud to vote for #HR1 to get big $ out of politics—it’s an important first step to ensuring government is #ForThePeople  https://t.co/jFEpL1VkHm

I’m so grateful on a daily basis for all the folks who stepped up and got involved after the 2016 election. The family and I enjoyed getting to visit with many friends with @Indivisible_WA8 today at their summer picnic! https://t.co/H0JQIY7UsM

Increasing the minimum wage from $7.25 to $15 by 2025 will help lessen poverty and help even out the gender pay gap for millions of Americans. I was proud to vote for this bill today because no one who works full time should be unable to put food on the table. https://t.co/vM8teunI7X
The way we get more women elected is to invite them to run and make sure they have the training and resources to succeed which is exactly what Emerge does! #EmergeAlum https://t.co/M8ocrZz58S
Congratulations @USWNT and to our hometown @ReignFC stars @mPinoe and @ALLIE_LONG for your big WIN for USA 🇺🇸! You make us all proud—on and off the field. #EqualPay #Fourpeat https://t.co/jtvyMDoQaU

As we celebrate #IndependenceDay let’s take time to reflect on our shared values & the best of #America as a model of democracy & home to those who need one. May we always strive to have our values reflected in our discourse policies & actions. 🇺🇸 https://t.co/gTyf5FFpa3
This is a win for democracy and rule of law. I look forward to an accurate count in the #2020Census https://t.co/b3De8um0cO

50 years after the Stonewall Uprising I’m honored to be celebrating #pride to honor how far we’ve come but to also inspire us to continue fighting for LGBTQ rights and equality. https://t.co/6J2O1DC31D

Our end-of-quarter deadline is coming up on Sunday at midnight. This is a chance to show any potential opponents just how strong our grassroots campaign is. Will you chip in $5 or more before our end-of-quarter deadline on to help us reach our goal? → https://t.co/Zh8HfvT0Gw https://t.co/HW5J3eLM1T

You don’t have to be a doctor to know that family separation and denying kids basic necessities is cruel inhumane and un-American. These kids must be our top priority which is why I voted for emergency humanitarian aid yesterday. https://t.co/T9sv7dudXG

One of the reasons that I decided to run for office was because I was frustrated with how slowly our elected officials were addressing #climatechange. It is time to take this issue on with the urgency it deserves. https://t.co/dql7ZU2ln2

Climate change is real and it’s a threat whether or not the administration believes in it. I’m supporting legislation that moves us forward to address climate change in a meaningful way https://t.co/EOwC2crqnL

The price of insulin has gone from $40 a bottle to nearly $300. That’s unacceptable.   In Congress I am fighting to make life-saving medications more affordable because I've seen the horrors of our broken healthcare system up close. https://t.co/lZ0Dx2z5S4

I had a fantastic time today at Wenatchee Pride! I’m proud to be a lifelong LGBTQ-ally and I’ll continue to fight for equality for everyone—no matter who they are and who they love #pride https://t.co/rTK8YXIbEH
Will you join me at the Pride parade in Seattle on June 30th? RSVP today to celebrate our LGBTQ+ community the progress we've made and all the progress to come!! → https://t.co/sMXcHwYDm4

The #EqualityAct would explicitly outlaw any discrimination on the basis of sexual orientation or gender identity nationwide -- but @Team_Mitch is blocking a vote on it in the Senate.    Join me in fighting back now >> https://t.co/CzK1LjFnML https://t.co/KMAHPWtbkc
I’m honored to #wearorange with @Everytown @MomsDemand and everyone here today to #endgunviolence https://t.co/fKTcLHEUIV

I #WearOrange to stand w survivors & activists against gun violence 1 of the greatest public health epidemics of our time. Passing #HR8 which mandates background checks & closed the Charleston Loophole was a 1st step—I’ll keep fighting until gun violence is a thing of the past

Washington state exports over $200 million worth of apples to Mexico each year. @realDonaldTrump new tariff will jeopardize the trading relationships thousands of workers and farmers right here in #WA08 rely on. https://t.co/S9BTgYxsHt

Abortion 👏 care 👏 is 👏 healthcare. And women in Missouri (& every other state restricting access) deserve the freedom to choose just as much as women in Washington state #EmergencyResponse #StopTheBans https://t.co/TvMBCynd3S
We honor the dedication of our military everyday but particularly on #MemorialDay—let us remember the service members and their families who made the ultimate sacrifice on behalf of our country 🇺🇸
So-called heartbeat bills have no basis in science and are a cruel attempt to control women’s bodies. I’m proud to stand with @DrLeanaWen and @PPFA to #stopthebans. https://t.co/Fa6s3H3r5o
If you tried to email my campaign between 4:30 pm Saturday and 4:30 pm Sunday please send again! A small internal error accidentally turned off our email during those times. Our apologies!

I’m so proud we just passed the #EqualityAct! No one should be discriminated against because of who they are or who they love. It’s long past time that we make discrimination a thing of the past https://t.co/yo9eUulxU7
While big pharma CEOs are raising the prices on life-saving drugs to fill their pockets everyday Americans are dying.   Read more: https://t.co/ubYpJxmjoR

6-week abortion bans like in AL/GA aren’t about protecting children. If the other side cared so much about children they’d be funding prenatal care pre-k & frankly they’d care about the children at the border. This is about controlling women’s bodies. https://t.co/iptxso6IkQ

After 17 years practicing medicine I know that when restrictions like the GA 6-week ban are passed the number of abortions don’t go down—they go up. And more women die from unsafe abortions. This is a decision for women to make; we have to get government out of the exam room.
Can’t wait to see everyone at the 100th #appleblossom grand parade today! https://t.co/6jjSaE60dR

Yesterday we passed HR9 which addresses climate change in a tangible way and included my amendment that recognizes the good work many in the ag community do to protect our environment. Climate change is real and we must address it now.  #NoPlanetB https://t.co/GOy5ZmCcHR

Anti-Semitism has no place in our society. My heart breaks for the congregants of the Chabad of Poway for everyone in that community and for everyone harmed by a gun. We must stand up and continue to say enough is enough. #Poway #GunReformNow

Healthcare shouldn't be a partisan issue we need to support a plan that's a win for the American people. Thanks to Cheddar Business for letting me share more about my plan to bring down costs & shore up protections for people with pre-existing conditions. https://t.co/GUMv1vmptP

The ACA gave millions of Americans who weren't insured access to affordable care. Now Donald Trump & the DOJ are trying to take that relief away. I am proud to be leading the fight to stabilize health and protect coverage for pre-existing conditions.  https://t.co/G3PnpMDLY0

I am so proud to be endorsed by End Citizens United. I remain committed to my promise to accept no corporate PAC money and will continue to fight to put government back in the hands of the people. https://t.co/a8PW4xajjI
I am heartbroken by the news out of New Zealand. We can not allow the epidemic of violent hateful extremism to continue to we must condemn it & those who inspire it.  https://t.co/AGPVoSgxLm
On this #IWD I am so proud to continue to fight for reproductive freedom and to announce that I have once again been endorsed by @NARAL! https://t.co/eJ8HZDhJBz
Proud to support #HR8 the first major bi-partisan gun safety bill in 20 years. #EndGunViolence https://t.co/u1HqEtFrZ2

So glad to have spent part of last week meeting with constituents throughout Chelan Douglas and Kittitas County. I love hearing about your concerns and priorities and updating you on my first month as your representative. https://t.co/DtVsTeJJ10
There is no place for politicians in an exam room. President Trump’s gag rule will make it harder for thousands of women to access basic reproductive care. #NoGagRule https://t.co/FmYYUDxq5K

President Trump's decision to declare a national emergency to get his wall funding is unacceptable. This is not what an emergency looks like this is an abuse of power plain and simple.  https://t.co/1ME4Kh8pmw

It has been 1 year since the Parkland shooting but in that year 1200 young people have lost their lives to gun violence. Yesterday H.R. 8 passed out of committee and I am dedicated to continuing the work for common sense gun legislation. https://t.co/ZgD076TKVA
Proud to be a co-sponsor of HR8 we need to pass common sense gunsense gun legislation.#UpdateBackgroundChecks #enoughisenough https://t.co/0pMaI8VEHb
Over 300000 people in the 8th are impacted by pre-existing conditions. Proud to be joined by 8th District mom and healthcare advocate Jenell Tamaela for the #SOTU.  https://t.co/XAIpNAvtl9

#OTD in 2009 President Obama signed the Lilly Ledbetter #FairPay act a critical step toward closing the #WageGap. With a record number of women serving in congress I am committed to continuing the fight for #EqualPay.

Only 5% of Congress is made up of women with young children. We need more moms who understand first hand the need for paid family leave affordable childcare and CHIP funding.   https://t.co/bv5aHHYk8s
